action.action-desc: Mr. Duncan of Tennessee (for himself and Mr. Kind) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Federal Crop Insurance Act to limit the overall rate of return for crop insurance providers and remove the requirement of budget neutrality in the Standard Reinsurance Agreement.

section.text: Section 508(k) of the Federal Crop Insurance Act (7 U.S.C. 1508(k)) is amended—

subparagraph.text: by striking (3) Share of risk.—The and inserting the following:
by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.header: Limitation on average rate of return
subparagraph.text: The target average rate of return for reinsured companies for the 2018 reinsurance year and each subsequent reinsurance year shall be 9.6 percent of retained premiums.
